::: {.callout-note}
Use quartodoc in your Quarto project configuration to pull docstrings from the `gem` package. Example snippet for `_quarto.yml`:

```yaml
quartodoc:
  package: gem
  sections:
    - path: gem
      title: Core API
```
:::
